description:
“Yep, he’s a shy one,” Brent said. “I like that... he’s tall, lean, cute... just my type!”

Randall was laughing nervously on the sofa.

“Here give me the camera,” Brent said confidently. He filmed as Randall unzipped his pants and pulled out his cock.

“Oh wow! You're already hard!”

Randall laughed again. He had the cutest smile on his face and it was clear that he wanted Brent to join him.

Now I know that Brent is NOT shy, and I knew that he was going to take charge.

Randall kind of followed Brent’s lead. He was a little tentative at first, but I think Brent made him comfortable enough to really let go!
title: Randall & Brent: Bareback
